title: Immediate hypnotic induction 2 / Non-verbal hypnosis masterclass
description:
This is the second episode of the video series "Immediate hypnotic inductions" from Dr. Paret's masterclass. The previous video you can watch here: https://youtu.be/wUrxt1SBfko Dr. Marco Paret demonstrates an immediate hypnotic induction with two subjects at once. They participated in his masterclass in Brazil, to learn and experience the most unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques. The subject in this hypnotic experience entered in a powerful hypnotic induction state, that transformed them deeply. A third subject was about to be hypnotized too. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
